Module bestSokobanEverV6
Package display

Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
display.FileHandler
public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
This class stores the methods for save and load score board to the text in resources.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Zhengtian CHU

    • FileHandler

  • Method Details

    • WriteFile

      public static void WriteFile​(java.lang.String username, int time, int movesCount, int levelIndex)
      This function is called when a player has finished the level or finished the whole game. Write the player's name, their playing time, moves count and the index of level(if whole game is finished, the levelIndex equals to -1) to the specific filef.
      Parameters:
      username - the name of the player
      time - the time cost of the level
      movesCount - the movesCount of the level
      levelIndex - the index of the level
      See Also:
      FileWriter, PrintWriter

    • ReadFile

      public static void ReadFile​(int levelIndex)
      This method is called after the score list has been write to the text file and it will load the text file and put the high scores in to a scorelist. Then, using a Comparator to sort the scores by time.
      Parameters:
      levelIndex - the index of the level(if whole game is finished, equals to -1)
      See Also:
      BufferedReader, FileReader, ScoreList, Comparator

    • JudgeRanked

      public static boolean JudgeRanked​(int index)
      To judge whether this score should be added to the top10 list.
      Parameters:
      index - in level index
      Returns:
      whether it should be added
